author: Reuters Editorial
title: Atlanta Fed sees U.S. economy growing at 4.1 percent in second quarter
text:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - The U.S. economy is expanding at a 4.1 percent annualized clip in the second quarter, the Atlanta Federal Reserve’s GDPNow forecast model’s first estimate of economic growth in the current quarter released on Monday.
FILE PHOTO: Model S side panels await installation at Tesla's factory in Fremont, California, June 22, 2012. REUTERS/Noah Berger/File Photo The model’s estimate on gross domestic product followed the government’s advance reading of first-quarter growth of 2.3 percent released on Friday.
Reporting by Richard Leong
